TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件都将引发事件时的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 在控件内单击时，之后控件更新记录。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 这使您可以提供的事件处理程序执行的自定义的例程，例如每次此事件发生时检查更新操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. A对象传递给事件处理程序，可用于确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定更新操作所影响的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用属性以确定是否发生任何异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果你需要访问已更新记录的键字段值，请使用属性。If you need to access the key field values for the updated record, use the property. 可以使用访问原始和更新的非键字段值和属性，分别。The original and updated non-key field values can be accessed using the and properties, respectively. 默认情况下，控件返回到所指定的模式后更新操作的属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 若要保留控件处于编辑模式，设置属性`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象传递给事件处理程序事件，以确定是否在更新操作期间发生了异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 受更新操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，表示在执行更新操作时引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception raised when the update operation was performed.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception is raised, use for this parameter.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||对象中包含`e`参数。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 在引发事件时，将主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the update operation.

value.span: 受更新操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定更新操作所影响的行数。Use the property to determine the number of rows affected by the update operation. 此值通常用于验证已更新相应的行数。This value is commonly used to verify that the appropriate number of rows was updated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以确定更新操作所影响的行数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of rows affected by an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取更新操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 一个 ，表示更新操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定异常 （如果有） 更新操作过程中引发。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且你决定要处理的事件处理程序中的异常，请务必设置属性`true`; 否则为该异常传递到下一个方法调用堆栈上进行处理。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定在更新操作期间是否发生了异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当更新操作期间引发了异常时，则使用属性以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 当此属性设置为`true`，将异常认为是已处理，而不调用堆栈中继续向上传递。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not passed further up the call stack. 如果此属性设置为`false`，异常传递到下一个方法调用堆栈上以进行处理。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以指示是否处理了该异常在事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInEditMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作完成后 控件是否仍保持在编辑模式下。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 如果在更新操作之后仍处于编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件返回到所指定的模式后更新操作的属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 使用属性指定是否控件应继续处于编辑模式。Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in edit mode. 若要保留控件处于编辑模式，将此属性设置为`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 如果你想要在特定情况重写的默认模式，则应使用此属性。This property should be used if you want to override the default mode at a specific occasion. 如果控件需要继续处于编辑模式下，默认情况下，设置属性改为。If the control needs to remain in edit mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以保留控件处于编辑模式后更新操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode after an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，其中包含被更新记录的键字段名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 一个 ，包含被更新记录的键字段名称/值对字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问已更新记录的键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回的对象实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问已更新记录的键字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个字典，该字典包含已更新记录的新字段的名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 一个 ，包含被更新记录的新字段名称/值对字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问已更新记录新的字段值。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated record. 例如，可以使用这些值来记录更新的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 属性返回的对象实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示已更新记录的字段的对象。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，你还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问用于非键字段的更新的记录由用户输入的新值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the new values entered by the user for the non-key fields of the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/detailsviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/detailsviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
